Texts.Chs: 把一枚^orange;绿手指奖章^reset;带给^green;叶族肉食商店^reset;(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring a ^orange;Greenfinger Medal^reset; to the ^green;Floran Meat Shop^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 叶族人丢丢失了父父亲的^orange;绿手指奖章^reset;。它是是极其特特殊的，因为父亲既是部落中最好的猎人，也在战争中杀了很多鲛人。也也许你能在^green;翠绿遗迹^reset;中找回它？
Texts.Eng: Floran hass losst fatherss ^orange;Greenfinger Medal^reset;. Iss sspecial becausse father hunted besst in tribe and killed many Hylotl in war. Perhapss you iss find in ^green;Verdant Ruins^reset;?

Texts.Chs: 哇哇哇！叶族人感感谢你！这是是家族的传家宝！叶族人会给给朋友回报！这些东西是我趁凯文不注注意从他身边偷偷走的，因为他每一周都会偷走我的裤裤子。
Texts.Eng: Oooooh! Floran thankss! Iss family heirloom! Floran givess friend reward! I ssteal thesse from Kevin when him not lookss because Kevin sstealss my pantss every week.

Texts.Chs: 让让让人悲伤的遗遗失物。
